meanings.definition: A broadcast of sports events on radio or television.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy listening to sportscasts on the radio.
meanings.sent2: The sportscasts on TV keep me updated on the latest games.
meanings.sent3: The sportscasts made me feel like I was right at the stadium!
meanings.sent4: Her voice in the sportscasts painted a vivid picture of the game.
meanings.sent5: The vivid sportscasts brought the game to life in my mind.

meanings.definition: To broadcast sports events on radio or television.
meanings.sent1: They will sportscasts the game live on TV.
meanings.sent2: He sportscasts the matches with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent3: She sportscasts the games like a pro!
meanings.sent4: The announcer sportscasts the excitement of the game.
meanings.sent5: Sportscasts can bring the thrill of the game to fans everywhere.
